description: The template deploys 1 DB, 1 ASCS/SCS servers and several (2-10) virtual machines that can host dialog instances.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys VM's customized for use with SAP NetWeaver and SAP HANA. The machine type and the number and size of the disks depend on the T-Shirt size (Demo/Small/Medium/Large) chosen in the template.
